data.description:
Metal: Hellsinger VR is a rhythm FPS bursting with demons, badass weapons, and heavy metal music. Slay to the rhythm of metal and vengeance on an infernal journey through the eight Hells. Make them fear the beat.

{1041362707342731}

![{"height":240,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75348046_1594396231410970_116649101107859559_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KYraJGznI44Q7kNvgHzcbZH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBuTJhUKq5h5k9gMu-hn65h0xXMMdQEJfTPVIfjE10XdA&oe=66FFD479)
Metal: Hellsinger VR redesigns the acclaimed rhythm shooter from the ground up. Enjoy a range of features from the original game, including the full epic campaign, Archdevil difficulty, Torment Challenges, and Beat Assist Mode.

![{"height":240,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974893_1221615232531531_7005435035540337966_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LreFinc0sykQ7kNvgF_bHd4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCK4R7o1tqlvIT_xU6_87R3zIH25ctCibEMsYXRiJUCww&oe=66FFD68A)
Step into the half-demon body of The Unknown and feel the pulse of metal rage through you. Experience an unparallelled state of flow as you move, dash, and aim in full VR.

![{"height":240,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982548_993402515315978_7051446151614344157_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NngDzLptNhwQ7kNvgEPT1YR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC6q_z0GY_0LC9lk7vwJnP6_-LkcMpeSCOI53gxpboarg&oe=66FFB2A5)
Shoot to the beat to make the music unfold and your power grow. See the world around you pulsate to the rhythm and be unburdened by a traditional interface.

![{"height":240,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_420584380816735_7033761956933477840_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=yWW5nswHKKYQ7kNvgG_-YlZ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBgNCozhGsP2DAltpzeAoEE3tJ_a5AbbHx5rF0e-vYIsA&oe=66FFCCD5)
Composer duo Two Feathers have created a thunderous original score, with vocals by metal icons such as Serj Tankian (System of a Down), Randy Blythe (Lamb of God), Alissa White-Gluz (Arch Enemy), and more!

![{"height":240,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/65227368_972488954427423_448745763377958557_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EzzaSWriHbUQ7kNvgF0tteI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAqLDaBfg35TjtBm6HHTHWtT6R3uyhlBNS1ekA59CQF7g&oe=66FFC05E)
The Red Judge stole your voice. For that, there must be a reckoning. Experience the epic story of revenge from a closer perspective. Embark on an infernal ride through the Eight Hells accompanied by award-winning actors Troy Baker and Jennifer Hale.

![{"height":720,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974893_399544249712100_7334203849291530445_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=j0ZOLpwHEooQ7kNvgHvtf4D&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCY5cc_ZeEZwgUgLizBSSRk8eQfZa2uVzPL_4wiUquMaw&oe=66FFCE46)![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75500283_911250010753629_4142127047316410355_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fIxH8Vnky1sQ7kNvgEITpwX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDwHJW5Pm99QmutyFLGo__g2hsrm6dougabw3tMzXuOLw&oe=66FFE458)
